trans-unit.source: Displays a set of text or image hyperlinks that enable users to more easily navigate a Web site, while taking a minimal amount of page space.
trans-unit.target: 顯示一組文字或影像超連結，讓使用者可以更輕鬆地巡覽網站，而且需要最少的分頁空間數。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.target: [節點](#nodes)

trans-unit.target: [節點的外觀](#node_appearance)

trans-unit.source: [Events](#events)
trans-unit.target: [事件](#events)

trans-unit.source: [Customizing the SiteMapPath Control](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control)
trans-unit.target: [自訂 SiteMapPath 控制項](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control)

trans-unit.target: [協助工具選項](#accessibility)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control is a site navigation control that reflects data provided by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項是站台瀏覽控制項，以反映所提供的資料<xref:System.Web.SiteMap>物件。

trans-unit.source: It provides a space-saving way to easily navigate a site and serves as a point of reference for where the currently displayed page is within a site.
trans-unit.target: 它提供節省空間的方式，輕鬆地瀏覽的網站，並做為參考目前顯示的網頁所在站台內的點。

trans-unit.source: This type of control is commonly called a breadcrumb, or eyebrow, because it displays a hierarchical path of hyperlinked page names that provides an escape up the hierarchy of pages from the current location.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型的控制項通常稱為階層連結或置頂，因為它會顯示提供的逸出的頁面階層中往上從目前位置的階層式路徑超連結的頁面名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> is useful for sites that have deep hierarchical page structures, but where a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> might require too much space on a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>適用於站台具有深度階層式頁面結構，但<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>可能需要在頁面上的太多空間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control works directly with your Web site's site map data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項適用於直接與您的網站的站台對應資料。

trans-unit.source: If you use it on a page that is not represented in your site map, it will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在使用它在頁面上，不會呈現您的站台對應，它將不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about site maps, see [ASP.NET Site Navigation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d).
trans-unit.target: 如需站台對應的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網站巡覽](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d)。

trans-unit.source: Nodes
trans-unit.target: 節點

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> is made up of nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>所組成的節點。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the path is called a node and is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 在路徑中的每個項目稱為一個節點，而由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: The node that anchors the path and represents the base of the hierarchical tree is called the root node.
trans-unit.target: 錨定路徑，並代表階層樹狀結構的基底的節點稱為根節點。

trans-unit.source: The node that represents the currently displayed page is the current node.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前顯示的頁面節點是目前的節點。

trans-unit.source: Any other node between the current node and root node is a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點和根節點之間的任何其他節點會是父節點。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the three different node types.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述三種不同的節點類型。

trans-unit.source: Node type
trans-unit.target: 節點類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: root
trans-unit.target: 根

trans-unit.source: A node that anchors a hierarchical set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 節點的錨定的一組階層式節點。

trans-unit.source: parent
trans-unit.target: 父代

trans-unit.source: A node that has one or more child nodes, but is not the current node.
trans-unit.target: 有一個或多個子節點，但不是目前節點的節點。

trans-unit.source: current
trans-unit.target: 目前的

trans-unit.source: A node that represents the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 表示在目前顯示的頁面節點。

trans-unit.source: Node Appearance
trans-unit.target: 節點的外觀

trans-unit.source: Each node displayed by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control that you can apply a template or style to.
trans-unit.target: 顯示每個節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>您可以套用範本或樣式至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The templates and styles are applied to nodes according to two rules of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 範本和樣式套用至節點，根據兩個規則的優先順序：

trans-unit.source: If a template is defined for a node, it overrides any style defined for the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點定義範本，它會覆寫為節點所定義的所有樣式。

trans-unit.source: Templates and styles that are specific to types of nodes override general templates and styles defined for all nodes.
trans-unit.target: 範本與特定類型的節點的樣式會覆寫一般範本和樣式定義的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> properties are applied to all nodes, regardless of their node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>屬性會套用到所有節點，不論其節點型別。

trans-unit.source: If both these properties are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些屬性定義，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>優先。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> properties are applied to nodes that represent the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>屬性會套用到代表目前顯示的頁面節點。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>定義除了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>，則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>, it is merged with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> to create a merged style.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>定義除了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>，與合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>建立合併的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This merged style uses all the elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>, plus any additional elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> that do not conflict with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個合併的樣式會使用的所有項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>，再加上的任何其他項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>，不會衝突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> properties are applied to the node that represents the root of the site navigation hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>屬性會套用到代表站台瀏覽階層的根節點。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>定義除了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>，則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> is defined in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, it is merged with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> to create a merged style.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>定義除了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>，與合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>建立合併的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This merged style uses all the elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, plus any additional elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> that did not conflict with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個合併的樣式會使用的所有項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>，再加上的任何其他項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>未不衝突的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if the currently displayed page is the root page of the site, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> are used instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 最後，如果在目前顯示的頁面是根頁面的 站台，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control uses the site map provider identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A> property as its data source for site navigation information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項使用所識別的站台對應提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>當成資料來源的站台瀏覽資訊的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no provider is specified, it uses the default provider for the site, identified in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Provider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何提供者，它會使用預設提供者站台中識別<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Provider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is an instance of the default site map provider for ASP.NET, the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者的執行個體<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control is used within a site but no site map provider is configured, the control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項用在站台內，但沒有站台對應提供者已設定，控制項就會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Events
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control also provides events that you can program against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項也提供您可以程式設計的事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control first creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> and associates it with a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項會先建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>並將它與相關聯<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is bound to site map data contained by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>繫結至網站所包含的地圖資料<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the SiteMapPath Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂 SiteMapPath 控制項

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method to customize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> controls contained by the navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法，以自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>導覽控制項所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For complete control over the way <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects are created and added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>, derived classes override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完整控制的方式如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件會建立並新增到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>、 衍生類別覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control declaratively in a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>以宣告方式在 Web Form 網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates some of the rules of precedence that govern the order with which templates and styles are applied to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範一些控管與範本和樣式套用到順序的優先順序規則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>節點。

trans-unit.source: The previous example uses the default site map provider and a Web.sitemap file with the following structure.
trans-unit.target: 先前的範例會使用預設站台地圖提供者和 Web.sitemap 檔案具有下列結構。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control and adds new functionality to it by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制，並將加入其中的新功能，藉由覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `DropDownSiteMapPath` control adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> after the current node, to enable easy navigation to pages that are child nodes of the current page.
trans-unit.target: `DropDownSiteMapPath`控制項會將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>之後的目前的節點，即可輕鬆瀏覽至子節點的目前頁面的頁面。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how to work with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects, including checking their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType> and calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method after the items are created.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件，包括檢查其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A>方法之後建立的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control to a page, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> object, set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of a container control such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項的頁面，建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>物件、 設定其屬性，並再將它加入<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>這類容器控制項的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control to a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.%23ctor%2A>建構函式來加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the example to work, you need to add an image to your root directory and change the image name in the example code from "myimage.jpg" to the name of your image file.
trans-unit.target: 如範例能夠運作，您需要將影像加入至您的根目錄，並變更影像檔的名稱從"myimage.jpg 」 的範例程式碼中的影像名稱。

trans-unit.source: Clears the current child controls collection, and rebuilds it by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 清除目前的子控制項集合，然後藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy" /> 方法重建。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 會呼叫這個方法由 ASP.NET 基礎結構，以通知使用組合為基礎的實作，包括衍生自控制項的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>來建立任何子系所包含的控制項，以準備回傳或轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Examines the site map structure provided by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider" /> and builds a child controls collection based on the styles and templates defined for the functional nodes.
trans-unit.target: 檢查 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider" /> 所提供的網站導覽結構，並且根據功能節點所定義的樣式和樣板來建立子控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method creates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> controls, associates them with the corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects from the current site map provider, and adds the nodes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>控制，將其與對應相關聯<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件從目前的站台對應提供者，並新增至節點<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The method begins by finding the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and then walks up the hierarchical tree of <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> for each one until the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.RootNode%2A> is reached.
trans-unit.target: 方法會先尋找<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，再一一查核的階層式樹狀結構向上<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>物件，建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>直到每個<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.RootNode%2A>為止。

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created, but before it is bound to its corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 個之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>建立時之前它已繫結至其相對應,，但<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method applies any templates or styles defined for a particular node type and creates and initializes any child controls that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> contains.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法適用於任何範本或樣式為特定節點型別定義和建立並初始化任何子控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>包含。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method adds the child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法會將子控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is initialized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在每個之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>初始化時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is bound to its corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>繫結至其相對應<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnDataBound%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method is called from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateChildControls%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法從呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateChildControls%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method to alter how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> controls are created or added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.
trans-unit.target: 擴充的類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法以改變如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>建立或加入至控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The manipulation of individual node items is performed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method, and most classes that extend <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> override that method only.
trans-unit.target: 會在中執行的個別節點的項目操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法，以及大部分的類別擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>覆寫這個方法只。

trans-unit.source: No <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider" /> is available to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider" /> 可供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style used for the display text for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於目前節點顯示文字的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the style settings for the display text for the current node of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，含有用於在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項中目前節點顯示文字的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the display text for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制表示目前所顯示的頁面導覽路徑節點的顯示文字的外觀。

trans-unit.source: By default, the display text is that specified in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that represents the page.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，顯示的文字是指定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>所代表的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 一般樣式設定包含自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>樣式屬性的節點會合併成單一的樣式，順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> or, if the currently displayed page is the root node, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> 或者，如果在目前顯示的頁面是根節點，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 除非明確設定為，如果您刪除線或頂線的樣式設定節點的字型樣式，不顯示節點的預設底線樣式`true`。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> property is defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>屬性定義，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control in a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>Web Form 頁面中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template to use for the node of a site navigation path that represents the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項樣板，讓表示目前顯示網頁的網站巡覽路徑節點使用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object that implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method, to render custom content for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 方法的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> 物件，以便呈現表示目前顯示網頁之巡覽路徑節點的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> to an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control or some other control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, as the current node's user interface element instead of a string.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>至<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>物件以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項或其他控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，做為目前節點的使用者介面項目，而非字串。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> property is set, the template overrides both the current navigation node text displayed and any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>屬性設定時，範本會覆寫目前的瀏覽節點文字顯示，以及任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>套用到它。

trans-unit.source: If the currently displayed page corresponds to the root node, however, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前顯示的頁面對應於根節點，不過，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>用。

trans-unit.source: You can declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以宣告一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>屬性設為任何 Web 伺服器控制項，並在 ASP.NET 基礎結構會執行必要的步驟，將 Web 伺服器控制項，做為<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, Web server controls do not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface; therefore, when you work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> properties programmatically, you must write an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper for any template code.
trans-unit.target: 不過，Web 伺服器控制項不會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>介面; 因此，當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須撰寫<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>範本中的任何程式碼包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> property is set to an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 然後，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>屬性設定為執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example declaratively defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> and overrides a defined <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會以宣告方式定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>和覆寫定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 繫結資料來源至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項以及其子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control is designed to retrieve its data directly from a site map provider by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.Provider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項用來擷取其資料直接從站台地圖提供者，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.Provider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control to bind to ASP.NET data source controls, and do not call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.DataBind%2A> method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制繫結至 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項，另外也不要呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.DataBind%2A>方法明確。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" />, which is a Web server control that represents a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />, with a set of child controls based on the node's function and the specified templates and styles for the node.
trans-unit.target: 填入 (Populate) 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 之 Web 伺服器控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />，以及一組根據節點功能和節點特定樣板與樣式的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method determines the functional type of node that the item represents by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>, and applies any templates or styles that are defined for that kind of node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法會判斷項目代表藉由檢查節點的功能類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType>，並套用任何範本或定義為該類型節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Root> item type, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> child control is created, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> may be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Root>項目類型，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>建立子控制項，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>可能會套用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> is set, its <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> is applied to the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>設定，其<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>套用至節點。

trans-unit.source: In instead the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> is set, it is merged with any defined <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> and applied.
trans-unit.target: 中改用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>已經設定，與任何定義合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>並套用。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if no templates or styles are defined, a basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is created and initialized with values from the node.
trans-unit.target: 最後，如果沒有定義任何範本或樣式，基本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制建立和初始化使用中節點的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Current> item type, either a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> child control is created, depending on the return value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderCurrentNodeAsLink%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Current>項目類型，可能是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>建立子控制項時，根據傳回值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderCurrentNodeAsLink%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Then either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> may be applied.
trans-unit.target: 然後任一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>可能會套用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> is set, its <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> is applied to the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>設定，其<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>套用至節點。

trans-unit.source: If instead the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> is set, it is merged with any defined <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> and applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果改用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A>已經設定，與任何定義合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>並套用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Parent> item type, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> child control is created and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> may be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Parent>項目類型，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>建立子控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>可能會套用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> is set, its <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> is applied to the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>設定，其<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>套用至節點。

trans-unit.source: If instead the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> is set, it is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果改用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>已經設定，它會套用。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator> item type, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> child control is created and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> are applied according to the same general rules defined for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Parent> node type.
trans-unit.target: 最後，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.PathSeparator>項目類型，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>建立子控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>會根據針對定義相同的一般規則套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemType.Parent>節點型別。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method to manipulate individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法來操作個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the design of the class requires more extensive control over how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> objects are created and added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別的設計需要更多控制方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>物件會建立並新增到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制，請覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method to add functionality to a control that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法，將功能加入至控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> is created by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> and is associated with its corresponding <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 發生在由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" />，且它與對應的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 關聯時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> 方法會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> has been bound to its underlying <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> data by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem" /> 已由 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 繫結至其基礎 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 資料後。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> 方法會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表所要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 從使用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SaveViewState" /> 方法所儲存的先前要求來還原檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoadViewState%2A> method restores the view-state information saved during a previous request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoadViewState%2A>方法還原前一個要求的過程中儲存的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style used for the display text for all nodes in the site navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於網站巡覽路徑中所有節點顯示文字的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the style settings for the display text in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 含有用於在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項中顯示文字的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the display text for all navigation path nodes rendered by the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制控制項所呈現的所有導覽路徑節點的顯示文字的外觀。

trans-unit.source: By default, the display text is that specified in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that represents the page.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，顯示的文字是指定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>所代表的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 一般樣式設定包含自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>樣式屬性的節點會合併成單一的樣式，順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> 或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 除非明確設定為，如果您刪除線或頂線的樣式設定節點的字型樣式，不顯示節點的預設底線樣式`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> is defined, it is initially applied to each node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>是定義，它一開始會套用到每個節點。

trans-unit.source: If an additional style is defined for a particular type of node, such as the root node or current node, this style supersedes the general style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他的樣式定義的特定類型的節點，例如根節點或目前的節點，此樣式會取代中指定的一般樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a template is defined for a particular type of node, it supersedes all defined styles for that node.
trans-unit.target: 如果範本會定義特定類型的節點，它會取代該節點的所有已定義的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> that is merged with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> to demonstrate the order of style precedence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>與合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>示範的樣式優先順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>節點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template to use for all functional nodes of a site navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項樣板以供網站巡覽路徑的所有功能節點使用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object that implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method, to render custom content for each node of a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 方法的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> 物件，以便呈現巡覽路徑每個節點的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> to an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> or some other control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, as a user interface element for all navigation path nodes.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>至<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>物件以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>或其他一些控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，為所有導覽路徑節點的使用者介面項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> property is set, the template overrides both the navigation node text displayed and any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>屬性設定時，範本會覆寫，顯示在瀏覽節點文字和任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeStyle%2A>套用到它。

trans-unit.source: For the current and root nodes, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> is set, these templates override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在目前和根節點，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>已經設定，這些範本會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A> property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以宣告一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>屬性設為任何 Web 伺服器控制項，並在 ASP.NET 基礎結構會執行必要的步驟，將 Web 伺服器控制項，做為<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, Web server controls do not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface; therefore, when you work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> properties programmatically, you must write an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper for any template code.
trans-unit.target: 不過，Web 伺服器控制項不會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>介面; 因此，當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須撰寫<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>範本中的任何程式碼包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> property is set to an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 然後，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>屬性設定為執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>, when one is specified, overrides styles defined for all nodes, including special styles for the root node and current node.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.NodeTemplate%2A>，當指定其中一個，則會覆寫樣式定義的所有節點，包括特殊根節點和目前節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> class and raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> 方法，並且引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated> event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>, which is a Web server control that represents a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, and associates it to a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated>之後引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>，這是 Web 伺服器控制項代表<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>，並將它相關聯<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method is called before the created node item is bound to its data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A>方法會建立的節點的項目繫結至其資料之前呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供事件處理方法執行自訂的常式，每當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>建立。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A> method after creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated%2A>方法之後建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.InitializeItem%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control binds to the data provided by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項繫結至所提供的資料其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如更新資料庫或顯示的內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" /> method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.OnItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs)" />方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of levels of parent nodes the control displays, relative to the currently displayed node.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項顯示的父節點層級數目，相對於目前顯示的節點。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the number of levels of parent nodes displayed, relative to the current context node.
trans-unit.target: 指定顯示父節點層級數目的整數，相對於目前內容節點。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates no restriction on the number of parent levels that the control displays.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示對控制項顯示的父層級數目沒有限制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ParentLevelsDisplayed%2A> property governs how many levels of parent nodes are displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control above the current context node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ParentLevelsDisplayed%2A>屬性可控制多少層的父節點會顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>高於目前的內容節點的控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, all parent and ancestor nodes above the current context node are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會顯示目前內容節點上方的所有父系及祖系節點。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The value for <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ParentLevelsDisplayed" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ParentLevelsDisplayed" /> 的值小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the order that the navigation path nodes are rendered in.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定巡覽路徑節點呈現的順序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection" /> that indicates the hierarchical order that navigation nodes are rendered in.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection" /> 表示巡覽節點呈現的階層順序。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent" />, which indicates that the nodes are rendered in hierarchical order from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent" />，表示節點呈現的階層順序是從最頂端的節點到目前的節點，並由左至右。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A> to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent> if you want to display the navigation path from left to right; the navigation path appears as a progression from left to right of site map nodes.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A>至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent>如果您想要顯示的導覽路徑從左到右; 瀏覽路徑會顯示進度從左到右的站台對應的節點。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the root node is at the leftmost position, each subsequent node is in the next position to the right, and the current node is in the rightmost position.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，根節點位於最左邊的位置、 每個後續節點處於到右方時下, 一個位置，以及目前節點處於最右邊的位置。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A> to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.CurrentToRoot> if you want to display the navigation path from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A>至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.CurrentToRoot>如果您想要顯示由右至左的導覽路徑。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the node order is reversed so that the root node displays at the rightmost position and the current node displays at the leftmost position.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，節點順序會顛倒，因此根節點會顯示在右邊的位置和目前的節點會顯示在左邊的位置。

trans-unit.source: While not as common, this ordering can be used for localizing Web Forms pages and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control for languages that read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 不是公用，而這種排序可用於當地語系化 Web Form 頁面和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項由右至左讀取的語言。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> in a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>Web Form 網頁中。

trans-unit.source: The value for <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection" /> is not one of the base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection" /> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathDirection" /> 的值不是其中一個基底的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection" /> 列舉行別 (Enumeration)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that delimits <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> nodes in the rendered navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在呈現巡覽路徑中分隔 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 節點的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the delimiter for the nodes in a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 表示巡覽路徑中節點分隔符號 (Delimiter) 的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is " > ", which is a character pointing from left to right, and corresponds to the default <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection" />, which is set to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是" > "，這是指從左到右，字元，而且對應至預設<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection" />，會設定為<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection.RootToCurrent" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> is defined, it is applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>是定義，它會套用至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> property is defined, both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性定義，這兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> to a string other than the default.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>預設值以外的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style used for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator" /> string.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator" /> 字串的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the style settings of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator" /> text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator" /> 文字樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the path separator that appears between navigation path nodes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>屬性來控制出現在瀏覽路徑節點之間的路徑分隔符號的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Common style settings include font properties and a foreground color for the font used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一般樣式設定包含字型屬性的前景色彩和所使用的字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> property is defined, both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性定義，這兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template to use for the path delimiter of a site navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項樣板以供網站巡覽路徑的路徑分隔符號使用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object that implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method, to render custom content for the path delimiter of a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 方法的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> 物件，以便呈現巡覽路徑之路徑分隔符號的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> to an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> or some other control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, as the path delimiter between navigation nodes instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> string.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>至<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>物件以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>或其他一些控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>，做為路徑分隔符號之間瀏覽節點，而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>字串。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> property is set, the template overrides both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A> text displayed and any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性設定時，範本會覆寫兩者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparator%2A>顯示文字和任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorStyle%2A>套用到它。

trans-unit.source: You can declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以宣告一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性設為任何 Web 伺服器控制項，並在 ASP.NET 基礎結構會執行必要的步驟，將 Web 伺服器控制項，做為<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>。

trans-unit.source: However, Web server controls do not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface; therefore, when you work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> properties programmatically, you must write an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper for any template code.
trans-unit.target: 不過，Web 伺服器控制項不會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>介面; 因此，當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須撰寫<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>範本中的任何程式碼包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> property is set to an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 然後，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>屬性設定為執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to define an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A> declaratively in a Web Form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.PathSeparatorTemplate%2A>宣告式 Web 表單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> that is associated with the Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與 Web 伺服器控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> instance that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> 執行個體與控制項相關聯。

trans-unit.source: If no provider is explicitly set, the default site map provider is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有明確設定提供者，則會使用預設的網站導覽提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.Provider%2A> property specifies an instance of a site map provider to use with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.Provider%2A>屬性會指定站台地圖提供者來搭配控制項使用的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This provider may be different from the provider identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A> property, if set.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者可能會從識別提供者不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SiteMapProvider%2A>屬性，如果設定。

trans-unit.source: The provider named by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider" /> property is not available.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider" /> 屬性所命名的提供者無法使用。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
There is no default provider configured for the site.
trans-unit.target: 網站沒有設定預設的提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered output.
trans-unit.target: 接收所呈現之輸出的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> content to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, for display on the client.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> 內容寫入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，以在用戶端顯示。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，代表用來將內容寫入 Web 網頁的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項中呈現節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderContents%2A> method to perform its accessibility rendering, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SkipLinkText%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderContents%2A>方法，以執行其存取範圍轉譯時，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性未設定為<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the site navigation node that represents the currently displayed page is rendered as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 指出表示目前顯示網頁的網站巡覽節點是否以超連結的方式呈現。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node that represents the current page is rendered as a hyperlink; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果表示目前網頁的節點以超連結的方式呈現，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The node that represents the currently displayed page is the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 表示在目前顯示的頁面節點<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.CurrentNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> property specifies the text to display for the current node, and its <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A> property is used to create a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>屬性會指定目前的節點，顯示的文字和其<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Url%2A>屬性用來建立超連結。

trans-unit.source: By default, no hyperlink is rendered for the current page to prevent erroneous form posts.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，目前的頁面，即可避免錯誤表單張貼呈現沒有超連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderCurrentNodeAsLink%2A> property to `true` to make the current node a hyperlink when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control renders its content.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RenderCurrentNodeAsLink%2A>屬性`true`超連結，讓目前的節點時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項轉譯其內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the root node display text.
trans-unit.target: 取得根節點顯示文字的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the style settings for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> control root node display text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 包含用於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath" /> 控制項節點顯示文字的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the display text for the root node of the navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制導覽路徑的根節點的顯示文字的外觀。

trans-unit.source: By default, the display text is that specified in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that represents the page.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，顯示的文字是指定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>所代表的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 一般樣式設定包含自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>樣式屬性的節點會合併成單一的樣式，順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CurrentNodeStyle%2A> 或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 除非明確設定為，如果您刪除線或頂線的樣式設定節點的字型樣式，不顯示節點的預設底線樣式`true`。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A> property is defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeTemplate%2A>屬性定義，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A> attributes on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.RootNodeStyle%2A>上的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。
